column1: Le Pontet (Provençal: Lo Pontet) is a commune in the Vaucluse department in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region in southeastern France.
It is the most populous suburb of the city of Avignon
column2: and lies adjacent to the north side of the city. Its citizens are called Pontetienne/Pontetien.

column1: The city has many sports facilities: two gymnasiums
Le Pontet is the home of Championnat de France Amateurs club
Le Pontet is also a town of culture. Since decades
column2: the Château de Fargues and the Roberty's Domain are the scene of several culture events.

column1: The Château de Fargues is also the city's school of music and dance.
Le Pontet also has an auditorium
Le Pontet has one of the main commercial areas of Europe
column2: called Avignon Nord. This area includes hundreds of shops
